name: Zoey
description: A Tokyo Mew Mew character infused with wildcat DNA. As the leader of the Mew Mews, she wields the power of the Strawberry Bell to cast devastating magical attacks.

passive.name: Sparkle Bell Mark
passive.description: When Zoey deals damage to an enemy with damage spells, she places a sparkle bell mark on them for 2 turns. Zoey deals 125% damage to marked enemies. The mark disappears when the enemy takes damage.

abilities.name: Strawberry Bell Burst
abilities.description: Zoey channels her Strawberry Bell to unleash a magical beam, dealing 122% magical damage to an enemy. This ability cannot critically strike.

abilities.name: Heart Pounce
abilities.description: Zoey jumps onto an enemy, dealing 855 + (50% Magical damage) to the target.

abilities.name: Sparkle Burst
abilities.description: Zoey unleashes a burst of sparkles, dealing 122% Magical Damage to all enemies. This ability's cooldown is reduced for each enemy hit.

abilities.name: Glowing Light Arc
abilities.description: Zoey unleashes a glowing arc of light that deals 100% Magical Damage to all enemies with a 75% chance to hit each target. If it hits, it disables a random ability of the target.
